endpoints.description: Submit new customer feedback for a product.
Retrieve details of a specific feedback submission.
Fetch a list of products within the consumer staples sector.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific product.
Retrieve aggregated analysis of collected customer feedback.
Obtain sentiment analysis results for feedback on products.
View trends over time in feedback data.
Request an evaluation report for a specific product based on feedback insights.
Update or correct details of a previously submitted feedback.
Remove a specific feedback submission from the database.
